messages.content:
Here's the user journal payload:

      ```json
        {
          "userId": "eac7a34d-f08e-4846-a646-cf107fe544ee"
          "title": "i'm going to the deepest low",
          "body": "i dont think i'll ever get a job, job hunting process didnt go as planned. My life is going on a downward spiral also",
          "cognitiveDistortionIds": ["catastrophizing","over_generalization"]
        }
      ```

      1. Call **distortion_detection** to take the payload, analyze, breakdown and suggest a feedback
      2. Call **enemies_generation** to build 6 alternative stories in a specified enemy json format

Here's the user journal payload:

        ```json
          {
            "userId": "a932d662-6778-4178-a1c0-c081989815b6"
            "title": "i'm a failure",
            "body": "Sometimes I look back at sophomore year and wonder: was that my peak? I had good grades, a cool internship, people I saw regularly. Now it’s all scattered. I barely talk to anyone outside of class. I go days without replying to messages. I can’t even say why. I just... don't know how to show up anymore.",
            "cognitiveDistortionIds": ["all_or_nothing_thinking","over_generalization"]
          }
        ```

        1. Call **distortion_detection** to take the payload, analyze, breakdown and suggest a feedback
        2. Call **enemies_generation** to build 6 alternative stories in a specified enemy json format

function.name: distortion_detection
function.arguments: {"payload":{"userId":"a932d662-6778-4178-a1c0-c081989815b6","body":"Sometimes I look back at sophomore year and wonder: was that my peak? I had good grades, a cool internship, people I saw regularly. Now it’s all scattered. I barely talk to anyone outside of class. I go days without replying to messages. I can’t even say why. I just... don't know how to show up anymore.","cognitiveDistortionIds":["all_or_nothing_thinking","over_generalization"],"contextKeywords":["failure","peak","sophomore year","good grades","internship","social connections","isolation"]}}

messages.content: {"success":true,"data":{"id":"b15bd65c-367b-4f10-808b-0f660afc77eb","journalAnalysis":{"insight":{"distortions":[{"id":"catastrophizing","type":"Catastrophizing","description":"You might be imagining the worst-case scenarios about your situation. It's common to feel overwhelmed, but try to focus on what you can control one step at a time."},{"id":"should_statements","type":"Should Statements","description":"You may be placing unrealistic expectations on yourself, feeling you \"should\" be handling things differently. Remember that it's okay to not be perfect; giving yourself grace can help ease pressure."}],"feedback":"Great job in recognizing your cognitive distortions! Identifying these thought patterns is the first step to changing them. Keep it up!"}},"metadata":{"neighbors":[{"contextKeywords":["guilt","thesis","group study","skipping breakfast","should've done"],"cognitiveDistortionIds":["should_statements","minimization_of_the_positive","catastrophizing","emotional_reasoning","self_blaming"]},{"contextKeywords":["failure","peak","sophomore year","good grades","internship","social connections","isolation"],"cognitiveDistortionIds":["all_or_nothing_thinking","over_generalization"]}],"contextKeywords":["failure","peak","sophomore year","good grades","internship","social connections","isolation"]}}}
